name: Directed Panspermia
description:
This is the first complete project I've made and I'm glad about sharing it with you.

It's a simulator of solar systems where you can play with the theory of "Directed Panspermia" and create life on different planets. This theory is interesting and I recommend you to read a little about it.

The procedural part of the game is the generation of planets with their own characteristics, stochastic changes and acceptance to the player's tools.

I hope people can get some fun with it and don't be shy telling me what you think about it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For the execution of this project I've used "sfxr - sound effect generator" by DrPetter, which have been an useful and funny tool.
